_source.text: 1 " Florida Gators center Mike Pouncey has heard the doubters, but he is steadfast in believing a few things: (1) he's better than his brother, (2) staying another year at UF had a positive affect on him and (3) he will be drafted higher than No. 18 overall [where the Pittsburgh Steelers selected Maurkice Pouncey in 2010].
